mapper.select: select categoryNo, categoryName from category where storeNo=2 and publicYN = 1 order by categoryNo asc

select menuNo, categoryNo, menuName, menuDesc, menuPrice, menuImg, unitNo from(select rownum rn, menuNo, categoryNo, menuName, menuDesc, menuPrice, menuImg, unitNo from(select menuNo, m.categoryNo categoryNo, menuName, menuDesc, menuPrice, menuImg, unitNo from menu m , category c where m.categoryNo = c.categoryNo and c.storeNo=2 and c.publicYn=1 and m.categoryNo=#{categoryNo} order by categoryNo asc)) where rn >= #{writing_Start} and rn <= #{writing_End}
select count(*) from useMenu where menuNo=#{menuNo}
select m.menuNo menuNo, categoryNo, m.menuName menuName, menuDesc, menuPrice, menuImg, isChange, unitNo from useMenu um, menu m where um.setNo(+) = m.menuNo and um.menuNo=#{menuNo}

select menuNo, categoryNo, menuName, menuPrice, menuImg from(select rownum rn, menuNo, categoryNo, menuName, menuDesc, menuPrice, menuImg from(select menuNo, categoryNo, menuName, menuDesc, menuPrice, menuImg from menu where categoryNo=28 order by menuNo asc)) where rn >= #{writing_Start} and rn <= #{writing_End}

select menuNo, categoryNo, menuName, menuPrice, menuImg from(select rownum rn, menuNo, categoryNo, menuName, menuDesc, menuPrice, menuImg from(select menuNo, categoryNo, menuName, menuDesc, menuPrice, menuImg from menu where categoryNo=29 order by menuNo asc)) where rn >= #{writing_Start} and rn <= #{writing_End}
select categoryNo from menu where menuNo=#{menuNo}
select count(*) from menu where categoryNo=#{categoryNo} and unitNo=5
select t.toppingNo toppingNo, toppingName, toppingPrice, toppingImg, ut.menuNo menuNo from topping t, useTopping ut where ut.toppingNo(+) = t.toppingNo and t.storeNo=2 and ut.menuNo=#{menuNo}
